0010101001100100 0101000010101010 0 -> sum: 0111101100001110, cout: 0
0001000101110000 0110100001000101 0 -> sum: 0111100110110101, cout: 0
1000110011011011 1110111101001100 1 -> sum: 0111110000101000, cout: 1
0011011000010000 1010100111111010 0 -> sum: 1110000000001010, cout: 0
1001111010100101 0110110001010111 0 -> sum: 0000101011111100, cout: 1
1001001111110010 1000111110001101 0 -> sum: 0010001101111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
